analyzed: chos smra ba de dag gi yon tan gyi khyad par rnams bshad du gsol /

original: de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro //

original: rigs kyi bu gang su dag chos smra ba'i dge slong de la se gol gtogs pa gcig tsam srid cig mi byams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni mir 'gyur pa las kyang ring du gyur pa yin na /

analyzed: @481b lus nad pu can du 'gyur /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavat said,

analyzed: kun tu bzang po /

translated: those beings who will reject this Dharma will mostly be renunciants.

analyzed: 'di skad du 'di dag ni snyan dngags sbyar ba yin gyi /

analyzed: 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin no //
translated: These were not spoken by the Tathāgata.

translated: We have never heard these sūtras before.’ They will reject this Dharma discourse.

original: spangs nas kyang mthol zhing 'chags par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: spangs nas kyang mthol zhing 'chags par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Having rejected it, they will not confess and admit their mistake.

translated: When they die, they will be reborn in the unbearable, blazing hell realms, because they have abandoned the Dharma.

analyzed: de ltar gyur nas kyang bskal pa mang po @483a *//

analyzed: thos na yang yid du mi 'ong bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
